venue.name: Coffee first then off to Mike's Maze

item.description:
Francesca, one of our meetup members has suggested and is organizing this meetup.

note from Francesca:

In case of bad weather, (or bad maze condition, given that it
has rained Saturday morning) we are looking forward to going to
Yankee Candle.

On the maze's website, it did remind us that during rainy
days, the maze gets extremely slippery. We may want to
postpone the maze for a drier weekend. I think the group can
make that decision once we are at Barnes and Nobles.

It will be easy to find me at Barnes and Nobles. I will be
sitting in the coffee and treats area, with a huge book I am
reading, Birthdays. So come over and let's see what we want to
do for the afternoon.

Ciao,

Francesca


P.S. for those that are planning to come:
it'll would be helpful for you to go to the Yankee Candle
website, and get all the details that are important to you to
decide if it is a good back up plan for you and your guests.
----------------------------------------------------------------


We've decided to make this event -- a Community Event
-- Intergenerational, bring your guests, their age and marital status is unimportant
(bring the kids, grandchildren, friend, etc...)

Sunday September 16 - 2 events in one!

2:00: Starbucks/Hadley
3:00: Mike's Maze/Sunderland


Here are the details:

Meet at 2p.m. -- at Starbucks inside of the Barnes and Noble bookstore in Hadley
for coffee and conversation - then carpool to the maze at 3pm

Directions and information - Barnes & Noble/Starbucks, Hadley MA:
http://storelocator.b...


The Maze is at the Warner Farm in Sunderland.

This Year's Maze
What a Wonderful World! Warner Farms magical cornfield is graced with Louis Armstrong! Pops! Satchmo! After 8 acres of goofy fun you will know what Louis meant by When You're Smiling, the Whole World Smiles With You. As Mike says, "Forget the forecasts!" This year, Mikesmaze will be On the Sunny Side of the Street.


Mike's Maze Address:
25 South St. in Sunderland

Fee:
Cost is $8 for adults
$6 for those 5 to 18 years old
and with a student ID.

For info. call 665-8331 or visit www.mikesmaze.com.

http://www.mikesmaze....



option: Yankee Candle

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Starbucks - Hadley then Mike's Maze - Sunderland
